Akron.Our Lady of the Elms High School:
Our Lady of the Elms High School is a private, all-girls independent Catholic college preparatory high school in Akron, Ohio, United States. Our Lady of the Elms High School was founded by the Sisters of St. Dominic (now Dominican Sisters of Peace) in 1923.
As of 2017, according to Niche K-12, Our Lady of the Elms High School is the best Catholic high school in the Cleveland metro area.
